Posts.Content: luckycb wrote: another newbie to the list......just found this site yesterday and wasn't sure if i should join in on the chat....waiting on my test results from by core biopsy that was done a few days ago.  trying to hope for the best but thinking the worst.     Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: waiting for results luckycb BarbDwyer

Posts.Content: Dec 30, 2008 08:52PM luckycb wrote: I finally got my biopsy results......It was negative !!!  Diagnosis: fibroadenoma. These past few  days of waiting were nerve wracking.  Now, maybe I can get a good nights sleep.  I want to thank you ladies for all your support.  I might not have written alot but I did alot of reading and was inspired by everyone that wrote. You will all be in my thoughs & prayers and I wish you all the best
Posts.Title: waiting for results luckycb BarbDwyer
